body:
I want to have the freedom to fundamentally change things in the engine.

But I want to enable other mods to be interoperable with me with little effort. I want to encourage others to adopt the new asset formats I introduce. For that, I need to make them easy to integrate.

So for each extension, it would be good to have a fork that shows how to integrate it into a reasonably-close-to-Vanilla codebase like OpenJK. I should provide the necessary adapters, if any.

Together with documentation, this could also provide a good starting point for people looking to get into JA source modding.
title: reference feature implementations
